name: TANK PROZX FREE VERSION
description:
Enjoy this incredible game, take control of the tanks and defeat all the enemies, put your reflexes to the test and become a PRO.

- W,A,S,D  TO MOVE THE TANK

- MOUSE TO ROTATE THE TURRET AND TO SHOOT, CLICK LEFT.

- AND R TO RECHARGE

- ESC KEY TO STOP THE GAME
